name: Shox
synopsis: Arcade rally racing gets fast and furious in the newest addition to the EA SPORTS BIG! line-up. Let it all hang out as you powerslide, get big air, and smash through 20 exotic off-road tracks. Charge with precision and blaze through Shox Zones to win the races within the race. Burn rubber to earn a new turbo-charged ride or wager it all for a chance to win 24 licensed beauties in the ultimate off-road collection.
